sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="text-center">
    <v-btn class="primary" @click="show = !show">touch me!</v-btn>

  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({
      show: true
    }),
  }
</script>

<style>
  .ma-enter {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .ma-enter-active {
    transition: opacity 2s;
  }

  .ma-enter-to {
  }

  .ma-leave {
  }

  .ma-leave-active {
    animation: 1s ma-slide forwards;
    transition: opacity 2s;
  }

  .ma-leave-to {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  @keyframes ma-slide {
    from {
      transform: translateX(0);
    }

    to {
      transform: translateX(-35%);
    }
  }

</style>
